text: @realDonaldTrump Mr. President Trump, i truly believe in you. You are getting a bad rap by the media and its not fair for you. We both know the coronavirus is a hoax brought upon us by B.G. for population control.5g is a kill grid. How can we petition it not to be turned on in your Country sir?
